Attributes.description: Application of economic analysis to marriage, fertility and health, gender inequality in labour markets and unpaid caregiving; the application of sex and gender-based policy analysis to topics related to employment, and technological and social change in current and historical perspectives.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: A103
